description:
Tachibana Tsukiko is the mother of http://anidb.net/ch96674 [Hina] and http://anidb.net/ch96673 [Rui]. Tsukiko began to date http://anidb.net/ch99131 [Fujii Akihito] after Mikimoto Jou, her ex-husband, left her for another woman and became the stepmother of http://anidb.net/ch98574 [Natsuo] after she got remarried to Akihito.
Source: Domestic Girlfriend Wiki
name: Tachibana Tsukiko
